alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 7:28AM EDT until July 11 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12 feet on 03/30/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11 Observed Stage at Mon 6 am: 7.1 Forecast: Mon 8 am 11.2 Mon 2 pm 11.7 Mon 8 pm 11.7 Tue 2 am 11.7 Tue 8 am 11.0 Tue 2 pm 10.7 Tue 8 pm 10.7 Wed 2 am 10.7 Wed 8 am 10.7 Wed 2 pm 9.1 Wed 8 pm 9.1 Thu 2 am 9.1 &&
